channel.title: Bruno Nicenboim's Blog
channel.description: Posts about computational cognitive science, Bayesian methods, EEG, and AI.

item.title: Welcome to my new Quarto site
item.dc:creator: Bruno Nicenboim
item.description:
A fresh start

After years of using Hugo, I’ve finally made the switch to Quarto.

The main reason? Hugo wasn’t allowing me to update my website anymore!

The old posts from my Hugo site are gone (for now), but I’m looking forward to building up new content here. Stay tuned!
